feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:32 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
